location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from P H Bridges, Commander of HMS Challenger, to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter issuing a warning that British merchant ships are at risk from pirates if they travel alone in the Gulf and recommending that they only travel in convoy. The letter also suggests that valuable goods can be transported by HMS Challengerfor better security.
